trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>类用于存储和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将存储它的所有数据行中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class supports several ways to access the items in the collection:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A>索引器以直接检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>特定的从零开始索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来检索可用于循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将项复制到集合中<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象，用于访问集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 若要确定集合中项的总数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>属性

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and display the values of a column on the page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，并显示在页面上的列的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 对象，它包含用于初始化集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 对象初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>类使用指定<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object should contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象应包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>用来填充集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于零的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象，它接收从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象复制来的项。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象中接收复制内容的第一个索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object, starting at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象中的指定索引位置开始，将此 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的所有项复制到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法中的项复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>到指定的对象<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象，指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象然后可以用于访问集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你必须使用从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items of collection into an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将集合的项复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: The array is iterated through and the values of the first cell are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 然后，循环访问数组和页上显示的第一个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象中的项数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象中的项数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>属性以确定集合中的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>当循环访问集合以确定上限，绑定的集合时，通常使用属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control contains any records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: A value greater than zero indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control contains at least one record.
trans-unit.target: 一个值大于零表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件包含至少一个记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个枚举数，该枚举数包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以获取可循环通过线性以访问中的每个项的枚举<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的枚举器中当前位置处的项，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将移动到集合中的下一项。

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将枚举器移到其初始位置，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你最初获取枚举数或使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将枚举器移到的第一项在集合中，必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item that is represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否则为由表示的项<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是不确定。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that contains the values from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来检索包含集合中的值的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is iterated through and the values of the first cell are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数循环访问或页上显示的第一个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象中的行是否可修改。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>可以修改对象。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>可以在所有情况下修改对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> 对象是否是同步的（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>对象是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>对象不是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中检索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>从集合中使用数组表示法的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The values of the cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 中的单元格的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>页上显示对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于同步访问集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步集合访问的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性来获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中返回的对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>对象本身。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象，它是从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 接口复制的元素的目标位置。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 该数组的索引必须从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in a <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。
